column4: No one has helped me more than people on his group, so now i come with hope in my heart to ask for help with my new homemade computer O.O *starry eyes* any people know hardware stuff?
whats it mean when you try to turn on a (new) computer, and the fans and lights run, but the drives dont open and the screen stays off?
you haven't connected the monitor?
: Its in there
eh.. what else to look for.. broken graphics card?
I dunno, I thiink its fine. I just got it. its a Radeon X700 512MB PCIe w/DVI/TV-OUT
the cable to the monitor is broken.. or something else on the motherboard is broken..
Could it be the processor badly installed?
most computers will do something on screen when started.. try switching monitors, if you have another
yes.. that could do that
Because i was really confused installing it.
Any way to check?
but then the computer usually beeps and makes all kinds of noises
Oh... that didnt happen
hmm.. no easy ones.. I'd take it out.. read the manual.. check that all the little pins are ok.. apply thermal grease put it back and see if it works
Do AMD 64s work with Radeon X700s okay?
second option is..... ,I'm guessing you're a guy, find a friendly computer geek.. buy him pizza if he fixes your computer.. if female.. do same.. but you wont have to buy pizza ;)
I haven't heard of any such problems..
lol ;)
Im a guy. Well, what about the fact that my board's an nforce?
I think it would still start... you'd get some kind of error message.. or beeps
you could check the memory too.. I don't think the computer will boot without memory
Well i put memory in... well thanks
you're welcome.. good luck
